ygData.subject: Re: Twinking??
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I say Twink....make up a story to go with it...my twin sister died to give these to me....I was given these by my mother who was dying....Whatever you
ygData.messageBody:
> I recently tossed around the idea of making a
> new character, exactly like my
> primary but with my "true" elven name (Sara just
> doesn't sound very wood
> elvish). A friend offered to hold my stuff and give
> it to my new character.
> Now, I have full banded, a combine, an ash bow, the
> works. My dilemma is
> this--I don't believe in power gaming or twinking.
> Granted, it's the same exact
> character, stats and all, just a different
> name......the stuff I have would just
> help me get to my current experience level quicker;
> at which point I would
> delete my current primary. So, to twink, or not to
> twink?
>
> Sara, Povar


I say Twink....make up a story to go with it...my twin sister died to
give these to me....I was given these by my mother who was
dying....Whatever you think would justify a level 1 to have banded...
Another thought is to work the new chacter up to 3-4 and then twink...
